required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Pharmacovigilance Study of Brain Oedema
clinical_study.official_title: A Pharmacovigilance Study of Brain Oedema in the Food and Drug Administration Adverse Event Reporting System Using Data Mining Algorithms

brief_summary.textblock: Literature reports the development of brain oedema following the use of certain drugs. Therefore, this study aims to present a comprehensive disproportionality analysis of brain oedema cases reported to the Food and Drug Administration Adverse Event Reporting System (FAERS).

detailed_description.textblock: Brain oedema is a serious neurological condition, as it possesses a significant impact on the functional abilities of an individual by causing irreversible brain damage and potentiates the risk of mortality. Apart from a number of medical conditions causing brain oedema, evidence suggests the association of various drugs with brain oedema. Therefore, this study aims to provide a comprehensive disproportionality analysis of the drug-induced brain oedema reports in the FAERS database.

primary_outcome.measure: Identification of drugs associated with Brain Oedema
primary_outcome.time_frame: Cases reported to the FAERS database since inception till 31/03/2019
primary_outcome.description: The search includes MedDRA (v-22) Preferred Term, "Brain Oedema (MedDRA code: 10048962) for the identification of all Brain Oedema case reports and drugs.

primary_outcome.measure: Detection of signals of Brain Oedema
primary_outcome.time_frame: Cases reported to the FAERS database since inception till 31/03/2019

secondary_outcome.measure: Stratification of new signals with respect to age
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cases reported to the FAERS database since inception till 31/03/2019

secondary_outcome.measure: Stratification of new signals with respect to gender
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cases reported to the FAERS database since inception till 31/03/2019

secondary_outcome.measure: Trends of Brain Oedema reports in FAERS database
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cases reported to the FAERS database since inception till 31/03/2019

secondary_outcome.measure: Trends of Brain Oedema reports in Google searches
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cases reported to the FAERS database since inception till 31/03/2019

secondary_outcome.measure: Description of the population of patients having Brain Oedema
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cases reported to the FAERS database since inception till 31/03/2019

arm_group.description: Brain Oedema induced by drugs reported to the FAERS database from inception till first quarter of 2019

intervention.description: All drugs having 19 or more Brain Oedema cases reported to the FAERS database

study_pop.textblock: Patients presented with brain oedema treated for any disease

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Brain Oedema cases reported in the FAERS database till 31/03/2019
- Adverse event reported was included using the MedDRA term: Brain Oedema
Exclusion Criteria:
- Drugs with less than 19 brain oedema reports
